activity.title: beckn/protocol-specifications#472
activity.text:
This is not limited to the page file but should cover any relevant files within the repository. As outlined in the issue description, the original PR was focused solely on the 'Governance' document.

Anyone who identifies additional issues in other files should link their findings or related PRs under this issue.

activity.title: beckn/protocol-specifications#472
activity.text: GitHub public repositories are open for contributions, but the final decision to merge them rests with the maintainer. Anyone can submit contributions
